name: Melodic
description:
Melodic is a small party game where you have to come up with any legitimate song that includes a given word!

The game is meant to be played  together in real life or could possibly be streamed together with your friends or even Twitch. Play solo or with up to 6 players to test your lyrical knowledge.

The group decides whether the given song for the word counts or not, you can make your own rules or be very strict.

I hope you all will enjoy this fun and small musical game, and I'd love to hear your feedback!

How to play

  1. The player receives a word. (For example "Life")
  2. The player guesses a song with that word it, and sings the part (For example "Is this the real life, by Queen").
  3. If the song is legitimate, then the word counts and you receive a point.

If the player fails to do so within the given time limit, the next players turn will be untill the game is finished.

Also coming to the Android Store soon!
